root.name: Awakening: The Dreamless Castle
root.description: A sleeping princess wakes up after years of slumber and finds that her people are gone. Princess Sophia is now on an adventure to find her fellow humans.Awakening: The Dreamless Castle is an adventure game set in a light fantasy world. This is the first game in the Awakening series, developed by Boomzap and published by Big Fish Games.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7CPU: 1.0 GHzRAM: 512 MBDirectX: 8.0Hard Drive: 137 MB
